meanings.definition: A type of dance originating in Argentina.
meanings.sent1: At the dance studio, they practiced the tangos with passion.
meanings.sent2: The couple performed graceful tangos at the ballroom competition.
meanings.sent3: During the party, everyone joined in the tangos for fun.
meanings.sent4: The tangos of life and love intertwined beautifully on the dance floor.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant music filled the room as they danced the tangos.

meanings.sent1: In the library, I found many books about different tangos.
meanings.sent2: She collected various tangos to add to her music collection.
meanings.sent3: The tangos on the shelf seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent4: The tangos on the page danced together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The colorful tangos on display caught the eye of every visitor.
